comparators.differentPosition.withDuplicates

Class Minimum

  • java.lang.Object
    • comparators.Comparators
      • comparators.differentPosition.DifferentPositionComparators
        • comparators.differentPosition.withDuplicates.DuplicateComparators
          • comparators.differentPosition.withDuplicates.Minimum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.function.BiFunction<jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,java.lang.Double>, jmr.descriptor.Comparator<jmr.descriptor.GriddedDescriptor,java.lang.Double>

    public class Minimum
extends DuplicateComparators
    Comparator class which compares each tile of an image to others of another image so as to get the minimum difference. Firstly it'll calculate the minimum differences between the tiles of the two images, and then, it'll get the minimum of them. This comparator can be applied whether the two images has the same number of tiles or not. It also makes a query based on a selected tag related to a search object in a specific position or combination of two.
    See Also:

                              java.lang.String position2,

        Sets the indexes of the tiles to make the query in order to search a specific tag located in a specific position or combination of two.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the grid dimension of the image to compare to.
        position1 - the first position.
        position2 - the second position.
        andOperator - true if an intersection will be applied, false if it'll be an union operation.
